content: > join my facebook group for community > coupons and cal challenges > > take me to the group 1 spice up your autumn décor with delicious crochet pumpkins from bernat forever fleece get ready for the changing seasons by making cute crochet pumpkins to decorate your home stitched in bernat forever fleece this free crochet pumpkin pattern is worked in continuous rounds of single_crochet with crochet cables created using double_crochet post stitches top with a cinnamon stick to complete the look of this unique accent it s a speedy pattern that you can whip up in so many different colors to match your space 1 https //www facebook com/groups/groupsalenabacacrochet/
